subject: Sports Injuries
Anger (Emotion)
Basketball
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire of the Knicks is the latest in a long line of professional athletes to fight an inanimate object — a fire extinguisher — and lose.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire of the Knicks is the latest in a long line of professional athletes to fight an inanimate object — a fire extinguisher — and lose.
